summary: Provides a configurable, parameterized quantum circuit composed of alternating single‑qubit rotation layers and multi‑qubit entanglement layers. Users can specify the rotation and entangling gate types, choose from predefined connectivity patterns or custom entangler maps, set the number of repetitions, insert visual barriers, and customize parameter naming. The class automatically generates a vector of parameters for each gate instance and assembles the full circuit.
business_intent: Enables rapid construction of hardware‑efficient variational ansätze for quantum algorithms such as VQE or QAOA, allowing developers to tailor gate sets, qubit connectivity, and depth to match hardware constraints and optimization needs.
